## Import.Importers.PathImporter class

[Importer](./ts-res.import.importers.iimporter.md) implementation which imports resources from a `FileTree` given a path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PathImporter implements IImporter 
```
**Implements:** [IImporter](./ts-res.import.importers.iimporter.md)
